document_data.name: Outland warrior
document_data.mainbody: '''Outland warriors''' were special [[warrior]]s found in [[Zakhara]] who traveled there from some other location.<ref group="note">Outland Warrior was a [[fighter]] class kit for the [[Al-Qadim]] setting.
document_data.Requirements: These warriors had no special requirements.
document_data.Role: Outland warriors served a wide variety of roles in the [[Land of Fate]]. Most native Zakharans viewed them with a healthy does of curiosity and/or fear.
document_data.Possessions: Outland warriors typically carried [[armor]] and weaponry foreign to Zakhara.
document_data.Special Benefits: These warriors did not have any special benefits.
document_data.Special Hindrances: Outland warriors stood out in Zakhara like a sore thumb. Their accents were thick, their armor was usually heavy, and their [[sword]]s were curiously straight. They attracted attention wherever they roamed.
